channel.title: Recent posts to status of libxzfile
channel.description: Recent posts to status of libxzfile

item.title: status of libxzfile
item.description: libxzfile isn't even in the alpha stage so there is nothing usable for now. It's not under active development, but it hasn't been completely abandoned either. That is, it's possible that it will get finished in the future.
item.dc:creator: Lasse Collin

item.title: status of libxzfile
item.description:
Hello,

The git repository contains a file I/O library (libxzfile) which would perfectly fit my needs (seekable files with a simple API). But the xzf_open function seems not to be implemented or committed to the repositoy.

Are there plans to fix this or is this library not under active development?

Best regards,
Christophe Delord.
item.dc:creator: Christophe Delord
